website_summaries.verdict: Pistol grip allows for precise targeting. We urge owners to practice with water first. Once the trigger is pulled, the stream is constant until empty.

customer_reviews.title: THE MACE GUN PREVENTED A PIT BULL FROM ATTACKING MY TWO DOGS
customer_reviews.text: I was walking my two large dogs yesterday when a pit bull came running at us. Thankfully I had my Mace Gun handy and sprayed the pit bull. The pit bull immediately ran away. The Mace Gun sprays in a thin steady stream for about 20 feet and is easy to use. It would be great if the Mace gun had a red dye in the spray so I could have marked the pit bull.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Koenker

customer_reviews.title: Well made, nice features.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to carry when out alone, it is slightly bigger than I imagined and looks a lot like a flare gun. Its too big to discreetly carry in a pocket but could fit easily in a handbag. I haven't used my test canister yet but its pretty straight forward. I love the safety feature and the LED would be useful for night use.
customer_reviews.author: JolieP

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT CONTAIN CORRECT INSTRUCTIONS OR BLACK TOP OVER CONTENTS
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A NON RETURNABLE ITEM AND I LET AMAZON KNOW THERE WAS NO BLACK TOP ON THE CANISTER AND INSTRUCTIONS FAILED. TRYING TO GET REFUND. LONG TIME AMAZON SHOPPER AND NOT HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: cpie

customer_reviews.title: Trigger doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! It came out of the package broken. My trigger will not discharge the spray! If I had not tried to test it with the supplied water spray, I would not have known it didn’t spray until it may have been too late! Obviously this can’t help me defend myself, and it was a waste of my $50. Then I was angry to discover I can not return it through Amazon because they don’t accept returns of “flammable liquids.” I contacted the manufacturer, Mace, but I bet they don’t get back to me :(
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Blair

customer_reviews.title: Raw power!
customer_reviews.text: Holy! DOES THIS THING SHOOT! I thought they were exaggerating about the power and distance this thing has. When you pull that trigger, there is no mistaking this thing is firing. The spray is in such a straight strong beam that it feels like I am using an old school 90s Supersoaker. I would totally love to have a million of these water cartridges just to run around spraying my friends in the summer time. I have no doubt this product will work wonders. I am carrying this when I carry my firearm to offer a non-lethal method for diffusing situations.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy construction
customer_reviews.text: Lights didn't work, spring bent in battery compartment and the unit was flimsy. Meaning it would not work and will break if you try and force the plastic trigger.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Die Cast Collector

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, crappy product that you can not RETURN
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, cheap product!!! It does not work. It will not spray at all. NO REFUNDS!!! Amazon needs to take care of its customers when crappy products don’t work. I might need to only shop at places that will allow you to return item that do not work as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Feels great in my hand. Good range and very accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Received mine a few days ago. Tested with the water canister. Very accurate from one end of the garage to the other. Feels great in my hand. I think this wouldn’t work so well up close but love that it shoots the accurate stream as far as it does. Can’t attest to the strength of the pepper spray and hope I never have to find out. But in theory, I’m about as prepared as I can be now.
customer_reviews.author: Betty the Buyer

customer_reviews.title: All pastic not metal like the old ones!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed at the fact its all plastic. I had an older one that I bought at a flea market thatvwas all metal. But the rubber sprayer tip was missing and refills dont come with a new one and mace dosent sell them separate. So be sure not to lose it or you will have to buy a new gun. Compaired to other mace products this is quite pricey. Also mine has some scratches or imperfections in the barrel. It was brand new in the package. But kinda looks used. Other than that I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: the dude

customer_reviews.title: Not refundable or returnable
customer_reviews.text: Did not work and is not returnable ...Also didnt ship till weeks after I ordered it ...please beware I never like buying something that is not returnable or refunded
customer_reviews.author: felicia williams

customer_reviews.title: Far superior to the "upgraded" model!
customer_reviews.text: The 2.0 model has a picatinny rail. It's bulky, it's ugly, and it's laughably unnecessary! This model is quicker to load, and the mag type (water v. mace) is much more immediately identifiable compared to the newer gun. This one is smaller without being difficult to aim or shoot straight. It's efficient, and it needed no upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mom

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: It was eligible for prime it is defective now I'm being told it is not eligible for return. Do to chemicals. Didn't open the chemical cartridge. I called Amazon they id take care of me. I wish the manufacturer had notified me of the non-return status.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Whatever

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: This is nonreturnable and did not work. If you press the canister in the gun with it open using the practice water canister OR the real pepper spray, it releases the spray. Once closed and using the trigger, nothing comes out. Happy I tried it without relying on it first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally Inoperable
customer_reviews.text: Simply stated the product does not work! The hammer does not push canister forward to engage the spray. Paid over $50 with shipping. Requesting immediate refund.
customer_reviews.author: Cn Larry

customer_reviews.title: This mace gun does have a good range in an enclosed area
customer_reviews.text: This mace gun does have a good range in an enclosed area. I tested it at 23 feet and was able to soak an 8.5x11 sheet of paper. This was with a 3 second water burst conducted three times. The gun shoots straight, but use the water stream as your sighting guide or tracer. The led light and strobe are very weak. I would suggest using in conjunction with a good tactical light if in a dark room.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gates

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Small, light weight, and compact. The Mace gun is easy to conceal and deploy and has a decent range. Other (more expensive) guns I've seen fire the chemical agent in a mist-like spray which I'm not a fan of. The Mace gun, however, fires a powerful jet-stream that makes it much easier to put on target. That coupled with the fact that it has the familiar design of a pistol makes it very simple to employ. In my opinion it's superior to the old spray canisters in nearly every way.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection from coyotes
customer_reviews.text: Bought for protecting me and my dogs from coyotes. Provides confidence during walks. Very easy to use. ... glad I bought it. It is a little large, so better to stick in waistband or belly pack than a pocket if you are wearing something light-weight. I've tried that and it repeatedly stuck or fell out.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great self defense solution for the money, despite finicky trigger.
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great, simple to use pepper gun. I bought this for my girlfriend who carries it with her to school and on errands. The strobe function built into the barrel is very effective and bright. The only reason this isn't getting 5 stars is because of the trigger. You will want to practice a few times using the water canister included, as the trigger can be a little touchy and hesitant to fire. Outside of that, again for the money this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: TFranks

customer_reviews.title: easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Light, easy to handle. I like the light, too. Fits well in a cargo or vest pocket. Have not needed to use the pepper spray but the water practice cartridge is accurate out to 25 feet. My information tent is protection against animals, so accuracy at range is important to me. This was easily the same range as the bear spray I also purchased (or at least the associated practice cartridge) and much less affected by wind.
customer_reviews.author: mayhemxpc

customer_reviews.title: EYE CLOSING LIGHT IS STUPID
customer_reviews.text: The logic of a light fails me. A light makes the attacker close his/her eyes blinking, yet we want Mace in the eyes and face. Go figure??? I flipped the batteries around thereby disabling the light. A better setup for ME.
customer_reviews.author: Robert  A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mace gun
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, good grip, easy to reload. I think this is a good alternative to using lethal force.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!! Can't get Refills.
customer_reviews.text: Who sells something where you can't even get refills for the product.
customer_reviews.author: tonyandjulie

customer_reviews.title: I wasted the first one before realizing short hits were better ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used actual pepper spray yet just the practice water cartridge. Wish they had given me two. I wasted the first one before realizing short hits were better than a long hit. water was gone in 2 seconds with two long hits. But I got the tree, dead center! Easy to aim
customer_reviews.author: sofie grace

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT...
customer_reviews.text: I am so thrilled with my choice. I feel much safer having some protection to buy time now. It feels safer having a plan. I like it appears to be a gun but actually mace. I also love the size for my hand being a woman. I will definitely order again as needed. I ordered refills to have on hand immediately should I have to use it. I had a horrific experience in the past not being protected in some way. Thank you for this product.
customer_reviews.author: DixieDarling

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. I bought two of these
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I bought two of these. One is for my wife to carry in her purse and one to carry in her car. Very easy to operate. It comes with a water cartridge so that you can practice with it. The strobe light doesn't really look like it would have a huge affect on someone, but that isn't why i bought this product. I hope we never have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh V. Rykard

customer_reviews.title: Everything i expected
customer_reviews.text: Have recommended this to all my friends , heard about it on walton & johnson & they were right , get one if you are uncomfortable carrying a gun &/or if you are worried about kids getting to a gun - A safe alternative for personal protection - CF / PS) Comes with a water canister to test how it works, which is really cool ! Din't realize about the built in light , but i have used it to find my keys, etc - HINT: Make sure pistol is on SAFETY before trying to use the light , as it is trigger operated !
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Fuselier

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Luckily, I have not had to use it. I would like to carry a gun, but I suffer from depression and do not want to take the risk. I used the tester cartridge and it sprayed quite a distance. I keep this in my purse at all times. Makes me feel a tad safer. I also like that it looks like a real gun, which may help deter attackers.
customer_reviews.author: A.N. Onymous

customer_reviews.title: Mace for protection
customer_reviews.text: I am not a gun enthusiast but thought the Mace Pepper Gun might help give me some security. The provided practice water cartridge is a nice touch and it works well. It shoots water straight as an arrow at least 20 feet. The strobe light on it is also a nice touch but I am not sure how well it will work in practice. I will follow up on this when I get a chance to use it which based on past experience will be never.
customer_reviews.author: Karl59062

customer_reviews.title: WELL WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of it. Some think the strobe is cheesy, but I like it. It acts as a flashlight to illuminate a possible threat, or it will go into a disorienting strobe with a second pull on the trigger. It provides me with a better sense of security when I go shopping after hours. To me, it was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Cool and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Cool. Works great. Trial with water then change out for pepper spray.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: ... carry this item in a belly holster and just love it. It shoots straight and long range
customer_reviews.text: I carry this item in a belly holster and just love it. It shoots straight and long range. I am old fella and feel more secure having this excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: lee mcelroy

customer_reviews.title: Best pepper sprayer around
customer_reviews.text: great security because it shoots 22 feet instead of the 8-10 feet of most pepper sprayers. Love that it comes with a water cartridge to get the feel of the sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: E. R. Landry

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Effective - better than most other comparable devices in similar price range.
customer_reviews.author: Spicy Noodle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I carried it around for a year and a half, I finally used it on a drunk black thug last night, it worked like a charm, I used the whole canaster in his face and he took off running like a scared rabbit, didn't have to go fist and cuffs with a drunk. I just ordered 2 more oc spray canasters.
customer_reviews.author: SAN VICTORRINO

customer_reviews.title: 4 when I don't wish to tote Magnum force!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one 4 a female friend after she had called sheriff's 4 help & they never showed. You are your first line of defense! I just ordered one 4 meself 4 the rare occasion when I don't wish to tote MAGNUM force! Outstanding product! Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Osterman

customer_reviews.title: I have to say this is a good self defence weapon
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is a good self defence weapon, its a little bigger then an actual pepper spray. But it gives longet distance, have a safe mode (which i truly love, because if its in my jacket, pants, backpack, purse, or where it maybe i dont have to worry if it shot for some odd reason.) Is this useful? well just depends of the way you think of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mizael Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: As pictured, do wish barel wasn't so wide. Wanted the pink so bad but got black one because it was most realistic color for purpose. Did 2 test clicks with water and it shot far both times. Very pleased, would reccommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mam

customer_reviews.title: Great device, weak light.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good non-lethal self defense device. Easy to load and fire, accurate to 20 feet (I tested it in the backyard). Feels solid in your hand. Doesn't look like a toy, which might have some deterrent value. Easy to carry in a briefcase, bag or purse, or just in a jacket pocket. Only room for improvement is the light, which is a bit underpowered. Overall, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: James Tortolano

customer_reviews.title: Feel safer already!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the water container to "practice" (which is a great thing to have) It was spot on at 20 feet. To use the spray bottles someone has to be right on top of you and they probably will be by the time you figure out which way to point it to hit them not yourself. (no guessing which way to point this)
customer_reviews.author: linda v

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but does look like a firearm from a distance
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy to have it, my husband ( and I ) do think it could be a problem if it mistaken for a gun by law enforcement. From a distance it will definitely be perceived as such.
customer_reviews.author: yogamomma

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a real gun I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Love love, looks like real gun, but be sure someone don't shot you from it looking so real, nice size. I'm sure someone would run the other way if you pointed this at them. I feel better having it.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Straight, Accurate, and Aluminum Construction
customer_reviews.text: Full Aluminum Construction. Nice tight -click- when you close the barrel, pencil stream is straight and accurate, and it exceeds the firing distance advertized. I trust it to defend my 19 y/o sister here in Detroit who is an attractive young woman and occasionally deals with harassment by the local wildlife.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bush

customer_reviews.title: Have CWP but wanted something less lethal, yet effective ...
customer_reviews.text: Have CWP but wanted something less lethal, yet effective in disarming a thung. This is the correct choice; small, effective range of 25 feet, light works to confuse the thug, and practice round turns out to be most valuable.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. N. Ashman

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, shoots well with test water cartridge
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, shoots well with test water cartridge. Feels and works like a real gun. Like the design compared to mace spray bottle type models.
customer_reviews.author: Tloke

customer_reviews.title: Deffective
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 both are missing parts. No spray nozzle,and they are not returnable .sucks
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feals good. The test cartrige shot without fault and shot ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feals good. The test cartrige shot without fault and shot about 20 feet. The only minus is that this thing is huge.
customer_reviews.author: FlyingFrik

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good range.
customer_reviews.text: I have this attached to my bike for aggressive dogs. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Have not had to use it thankfully, but made with quality
customer_reviews.text: The gun is made with excellent quality and shipped promptly to my house. The only reason I give it 4 stars is because the range on it is not exactly 25'. However, it will shoot further than other pepper spray bottles
customer_reviews.author: The self reliant kid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All three colors are GREAT. Wife and I carry everywhere. Buy the holster too.
customer_reviews.author: joepeeler

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for friends
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a few female friends that live alone.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Good design for home.
customer_reviews.text: My wife feels comfortable with it when she's alone in rural Maine and doesn't want to worry about keeping a pistol secure. Having the water test canister is a plus. The design may be a bit large for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Feel much safer with this for protection as the range is 20 feet and it is a hard heavy flow.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L

customer_reviews.title: great product, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: great product, easy to use, compact, I bought the holster and attached it to my bike. Makes me feel safer against dogs and if any other threats would arise
customer_reviews.author: Jwill72

customer_reviews.title: Tom was wonderful, and I had a new gun within just ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a Mace Pepper Gun for a gift, and was surprised that it was made of plastic. I have had one for a couple of years, and it is made of metal. When I received the new plastic gun, I gave it as a gift and found that it did not work properly. Tom Babilla at www.mystungun.com was wonderful, and I had a new gun within just a few days. He was very gracious, and made sure I had all of the needed information about the workings of the gun. Thank you Tom! A. Ervin
customer_reviews.author: A. Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Good personal protection to keep around the home
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a girl friend for personal protection. She practiced with the water can first and thinks she is ready in case she needs to use it. Good thing to have that is accessible in the home. It has a good range.
customer_reviews.author: LJS

customer_reviews.title: This is great, really makes you feel safer walking around places ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great, really makes you feel safer walking around places at night or unknown areas. Has a training cartridge and pepper spray. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Shea

customer_reviews.title: Does not fire
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to test this twice with the mace in it ... It does not fire when needed. So that is dangerous and defeats the whole purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The water cartridge is actually a lot of fun. Way better than most squirt guns
customer_reviews.text: The water cartridge is actually a lot of fun. Way better than most squirt guns. Easy to practice with and get good at it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Made the entire thing useless; squirted water all over due to an unintended ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective. Rubber tip was melted inside of gun barrel. Made the entire thing useless; squirted water all over due to an unintended discharge. Demanding money back and would not buy again. EPIC FAIL.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Canzoneri

customer_reviews.title: Protect yourself
customer_reviews.text: A very neat way of having my wife protect herself without carrying a gun.
customer_reviews.author: Thoms

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: it works great and the pepper spray is burns to all high hell. warning. you will not get 7 shots out of this. it WILL SPRAY A STRONG STREAM AS LONG AS YOU HOLD THE TRIGGER!!!!!!! which with that strong sh#t is more than enough
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: It saved my Son and my Life
customer_reviews.text: A Schizophrenic person screamed and got a big knife. I tackled him and tried to take the knife away for 10 minutes till I gave up., He got up and ran and I thought oh no I am dead. I got this pepper spray gun and it was over instantly long enough for me to get to my truck He came back after me with scissors. I shot him again good in the face., Police came end of story! Oh my god. I had beat him to a pulp with my fists but he kept coming..
customer_reviews.author: Banditt

customer_reviews.title: Great back up
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for dad he liked it, get extra cartridges
customer_reviews.author: Paul Chapman

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect form of protection
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect form of protection! It is small enough for a purse or sweat suit pocket. I will be ordering one for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT LEAGAL PROTECTIVE SIDE ARM IN CALIFORNIA
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT LEAGAL PROTECTIVE SIDE ARM IN CALIFORNIA........WE ARE WORKING HARD TO SEE THAT THE GOOD PEOPLE OF CALIFORNIA DO NOT HAVE TO DEFER TO THE SCUM AND BAD FOLKS. WE NEED POLITICIANS BOTH DEMOCRATS AND REPUBLICANS WHO ARE GOOD PEOPLE ORIENTED NOT CATER TO THE BAD ELEMENT AS THEY DO NOW. GIVING LIFE TERMS IN PRISON FOR SOMEONE WHO HAS TAKEN ANOTHERS LIFE IS WRONG.....WRONG.....WRONG. AN EYE FOR AN EYE AND A TOOTH FOR A TOOTH. AMERICA TODAY IS IN THE HANDS OF THE BAD FOLKS WE HAVE TO ELECT POLITICIANS WHO WILL RETURN AMERICA TO THE GOOD PEOPLE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have not used it, so as far as ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it, so as far as functionality I don't know. A bit too bulky, Its about the size of a real gun. Its very hard to conceal, especially if your a lady. It would definitely would have to be in your purse. Carrying a holster wouldn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Alley

customer_reviews.title: Great for those seeking a compact yet powerful non lethal ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for those seeking a compact yet powerful non lethal defense. I carry it when I need to walk alone after dark. The way it looks exactly like a gun is plus!!
customer_reviews.author: Raina

customer_reviews.title: however any chance is better than no chance
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device for my Mother in Law. She's concerned about the neighborhood where she goes shopping. I know that she would not use a firearm against an assailant; but this less than lethal gun would give her a chance to get to her car and escape. It's compact, very light and less likely to cause the legal difficulties that go along with defending yourself with a firearm. I realize that a pepper spray gun won't work in all situations,however any chance is better than no chance. I find this to be a very practical device as long as you consider it's limitations and develop a suitable strategy about how and when to use it. Dave
customer_reviews.author: celtic carver

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I've only used water in it, but seems accurate, shoops far, and is easy to operate. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: R. LUCAS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am afraid it looks too much like a gun, though.
customer_reviews.author: susan davidson

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, well made
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, well made....hope my wife doesn't need to use it...but it is very effective....practicing with the water cartridge was very helpful...Thumbs up!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, has a good spraying distance, i've since purchased several
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed that it didn't have a practice cartage with it.
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several so I must have missed the fact that this one did not come with two cartages. I went with the least expensive one because they all looked about the same. I haven't used it or opened the package yet because I can't practice with it anyway. It will work well in the glovebox instead of an expensive handgun. I had one stolen out of the glovebox not long ago and my wife is more likely to use this anyway and it gives some sense of security.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, simple
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, simple, utilitarian. These are the words I would use to describe the Mace Pepper Gun. Works exactly as described, referring to the range and the amount of shots per canister. Thinking about getting another one for the wife. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Cherokee Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This mace gun is awesome...shoots accurately and the distance is impressive. Id be careful pulling it on someone who has a real gun tho, because it looks real at a glance
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: One time buy.  Not normally avail. in my state.
customer_reviews.text: Test fired with the water cartridge. Works great. Many sites would not sell in California, this one did. Future orders were not able to be filled. The cartridges are easily available, but not the "holder" Go figure!
customer_reviews.author: PapaMatt

customer_reviews.title: The best pepper spray defense available
customer_reviews.text: Extremely accurate. Great feel when holding. Love the safety switch on the back of barrel. Stobe light is a great feature. Love that it's so easy to change canisters without having to throw away gun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Especially For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty accurate, very efficient also + it looks like a gun @ night I work @ a unarmed sight @ night I only had to use it once... Perfect shot when it's not windy. It does look like a gun @ night but I don't think I would pump fake in a situation and then my perp had a real gun and draws on me. I don't have a pistol on me all the time... I Will so but anyway, god bless whoever made this product
customer_reviews.author: Flaco Vida

customer_reviews.title: Great gun, easy to use just cock the hammer ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gun, easy to use just cock the hammer back and ready to fire. Has small light that lights up when trigger is pulled.
customer_reviews.author: gcam

customer_reviews.title: Best it will not kill
customer_reviews.text: Very practical as concealed weapon. Best it will not kill.
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Gun came as listed the strobe led light was either too weak or hopefully the battery just need to be replaced
customer_reviews.author: Jesse's World

customer_reviews.title: very nice gun, I haven't use it yet even to ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice gun, I haven't use it yet even to try it, apparently the job of this gun is no joke so I'm very careful, I hope I will not to have to use it,
customer_reviews.author: Frequent  shopper from Ca.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GreAt and safe self defense option, has gotten me out of one tight spot so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bender

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: A little big to comfortably carry around without a purse or bag but works well!
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This looks like it will probably be a great product, which I hope to never have to use; but it did not come with the advertised practice cartridge. I should probably return it. 2 stars for the false advertising and inconvenience of having to return it. Update: I feel unsmart. Once I opened the product I found that the water practice cartridge was actually already loaded into the gun, and therefore not visible in the package. This seems like a very efficient method of packaging. The spray seems as though it would easily hit someone 15ft away and the light was powerful enough to illuminate my target very well.
customer_reviews.author: I. Perry

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend taking the LED battery out of the unit
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's meant to do, but the LED is a joke, I'd recommend taking the LED battery out of the unit. The test cartridge is a definite plus. Practice makes perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Orion57

customer_reviews.title: did I recieve a knock off?????
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I purchased. The first was great and all metal and really felt like it will last forever. This time I got a plastic piece of (youknowwhat). Plus this feels bigger than the other one. Dont go for the black one!
customer_reviews.author: F.Caetano

customer_reviews.title: Great product for self defense at a distance
customer_reviews.text: Great product for self defense at a distance. Without having lethal consequences. Message us if you are female try this product. Especially for jogging around the neighborhood or on a trail.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Smith

customer_reviews.title: Feel protected.
customer_reviews.text: Water cartridge worked great. Have the real stuff ready. Hope to never use it but carry it faithfully. A comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Easy rider

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item and I have purchased a few more for my daughters and friends..OUTSTANDING PRODUCT very pleased
customer_reviews.author: william jones

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This thing doesn't fire half the time. Very unreliable and therefore defeats the purpose as a self-defense tool. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kgiovanni

customer_reviews.title: It is Ok now!
customer_reviews.text: Now is OK!But it also not bu used easily at beginning!
customer_reviews.author: Yi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product...
customer_reviews.text: Great product has a good 15 to 20 feet accuracy and a straight stream...
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bramham

customer_reviews.title: This Mace gun does exactly what the manufacturer says it ...
customer_reviews.text: This Mace gun does exactly what the manufacturer says it does. A strong stream at 15 feet - no problems. I bought this for my daughter who lives alone.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: That is a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Men and lady's, carry one of these every day you go out. The problem is that you need to find where you can buy only the pepper spray! It comes with one pepper and one water. When you buy a new cartridge they come with one pepper and one water. That is a waste of money, not to mention you will have so many different cartridges you might be carrying the water and not the pepper spray!!!!! That could put your live at risk.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Leister

customer_reviews.title: Just like advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Works just like advertised in practice (hope we never have to use it in real life!)
customer_reviews.author: C. Rich

customer_reviews.title: which is too bad, since I bought it for a trailrunner
customer_reviews.text: 15 seconds of spray max. Made from genuine plastic. Little light is weaker than a keychain light, and the battery is completely unrecognizable...definitely not 2032 as someone else posted. Gun's body is too fat to be carried anywhere on one's person, which is too bad, since I bought it for a trailrunner. I think it's a cool idea poorly executed.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Downing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As I expected as friend had one and had shown me.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my father as a Christmas present. He appreciated it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gun. Shoots steady stream right on target
customer_reviews.text: Great gun. Shoots steady stream right on target. Easy to carry and conceal. I feel much safer walking the dogs at night.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F. Gunsur

product_meta.title: Mace Brand Self Defense Pepper Spray Gun with Strobe LED to Aim and Distract Threats, Police Strength with UV Dye, 20' Spray, 28 Grams, 6.5" x 4.5"
product_meta.description: At Mace, we believe there's power in being prepared. Mace Brand personal defense products prepare you to protect yourself when it counts. When you know you’re ready, you can walk through the world with greater confidence. Mace Brand Pepper Spray is different. To be clear, Mace is Pepper Spray. But not all pepper spray is Mace Brand. Mace began with the invention of a chemical compound in 1965, which later evolved into pepper spray in the 1980s. We not only invented pepper spray; we continue to innovate the industry with powerful formulas, fast-acting delivery systems, and new safety features that ensure the ultimate in protection and peace of mind. And our products are trusted by law enforcement around the world. Look for the Mace Brand Authentic Product Seal. We created our seal of authenticity to separate Mace Brand from other products. The seal is your guarantee of quality. When it comes down to protecting your safety, it’s smart to trust the best.
feature_bullets: ACCURATE, LONG-RANGE PROTECTION: Weighing 28 grams, the advanced pepper gun delivery system contains 7 bursts and shoots Mace spray in a power stream pattern for protection up to 20 feet.

STRONG FORMULA: 10% OC pepper spray causes respiratory distress and coughing, impaired vision and an intense burning sensation to the skin while UV dye leaves a long-lasting residue to support investigation and identification.

EASY AND EFFECTIVE: Pepper gun cartridge is easy to load and pistol-grip design maximizes point-and-shoot accuracy. Deploy the pepper spray by placing your thumb on the trigger and pressing it for two to three second bursts.

SAFE AND CONVENIENT: Slide-release switch prevents accidents or misfires. For enhanced safety and comfort, your pepper gun comes with one practice water cartridge and one OC pepper spray cartridge for self defense.

INTEGRATED LED LIGHT: A dual mode LED strobe light distracts threats and enhances your aim. Mace Brand pepper spray is 100% TSA/FAA compliant for checked baggage airline travel. MACE holster sold separately.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
